statements: DELETE FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE location = 'Factory A';
DELETE FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Factory A';
DELETE FROM impact_of_industrial_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Chemical Processing' AND impact_description LIKE '%pollution%';
DELETE FROM ecosystems_impact WHERE industrial_activity = 'Mining' AND impact_description = 'Severe';
DELETE FROM biodiversity_info WHERE threat_level = 'High' AND population_size < 1000;
DELETE FROM ecosystem_information WHERE region = 'Tropical' AND biodiversity_index < 50;
DELETE FROM impact_assessment WHERE id = 3 AND activity_name = 'Construction';
